description: Number of independent sets of nodes in graph K_6 X C_n (n > 2).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (5,7,1).
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[7, 1, 43]; [n le 3 select I[n] else 5*Self(n-1)+7*Self(n-2)+Self(n-3): n in [1..25]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 27 2012
author: Stephen G. Penrice (spenrice(AT)ets.org), Dec 19 1999
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Dec 20 1999
